name: Logiclx - Logic 2010 website improvements
description: The Logic 2010 software used by many universities has an accompanying website at logiclx.humnet.ucla.edu which is very old and hard on the eyes. This style modernizes it and makes it much more easy to read.
additional_info:
Release 0.0.1
 - initial release
Release 0.0.2
 - fix table border color
Release 0.0.3
 - fix overapplied th padding
Release 0.1.0
 - some small incremental improvements and bug fixes
Release 0.1.1
 - added !important keyword to fix some inheritance problems
